page.title: 05Sennen Beach
page.content: Sometimes{Sennen beach}can be fun. But it can be quite{dangerous}because you can get caught by a current and pulled out to the sea, or you can slip off a sandbank,and get cut by glass or get cut by sharp metal things.Mostly if you go too far into the sea you can get stuck on a rock.You would have to wait for the{lifeguards boat}to come and get you off the rock.If they dont come you could get swept off the rock and fall into the sea and you might be drowned because it is a dangerous beach.We have{lifeguards}looking after the people on the beach in the summer If people get into trouble or have difficulty the{lifeguards}rescue them on a {surf board}or with their{speed {boat.}The flags the{lifeguards}use are red and yellow for the safe swimming area,red is for no swimming and black and white for surfers and canoeists.
